source.0ca5f988:
df = pd.read_csv('../input/database.csv', encoding='utf-8')
df.drop_duplicates(inplace=True) # drop duplicates if any.
df.shape # num rows x num columns.
source.e7186c9b:
miss_val = (df.isnull().sum()/len(df)*100).sort_values(ascending=False) # columns and their missing values in percentage.
miss_val[miss_val>0]
source.ae7d4e0e:
strike = ['Radome Strike', 'Windshield Strike', 'Nose Strike', 'Engine1 Strike', 'Engine2 Strike', 'Engine3 Strike',
          'Engine4 Strike', 'Propeller Strike', 'Wing or Rotor Strike', 'Fuselage Strike', 'Landing Gear Strike',
          'Tail Strike', 'Lights Strike', 'Other Strike']
source.3d288cc8:
table = df.groupby('Incident Month')[strike].sum()
table # Incident Month vs Strike.
source.37454490: table.sum(axis=0).sum(), table.sum(axis=1).sum() # sum of all rows and all columns.
source.f4050c4b:
from scipy import stats

chi2_stat, p_val, dof, ex = stats.chi2_contingency(table)
print("===Chi2 Stat===")
print(chi2_stat)
print("\n")
print("===Degrees of Freedom===")
print(dof)
print("\n")
print("===P-Value===")
print(p_val)
print("\n")
print("===Contingency Table===")
pd.DataFrame(ex)
source.0ebc7f6b: It seems that Jul-Aug-Sep in particular see maximum incidents.
source.dd99c989:
It seems that the incidents keep on increasing every year. But, this might not be the case.
*"Awareness in terms of reporting wildlife incidents has increased over time, as has the ease of reporting, due to advances in telecommunications. This means that although the number of records has increased over the years, this does not necessarily indicate a true increase in the number of incidents that have occurred."* -> https://aertecsolutions.com/2019/02/04/the-impact-of-wildlife-on-aviation/?lang=en
source.ec1eace5: Now, lets find the minimum frequencies in the table.
source.a055c13f:
p-value is 0 (<0.01). This means that Null hypothesis is rejected at 1% level of significance.
This means that Incident month and Aircraft Strike are infact not independent from each other.
source.0f02596f:
Null Hypothesis, H0: Incident month and Aircraft Strike are independent of each other.
Alternate Hypothesis, H1: Incident month and Aircraft Strike are not independent of each other.
source.b7b057ae: Below is a list of column names. These columns are categorical with 0-1 binary values. They record if a particular part of Aircraft udergo strike with wildlife or not.
source.2ce08450: Let us check using chi-square test of independence, whether Aircraft Strikes and Incident Month are independent.
source.a61079fa: Sum of all rows and all columns of table are equal, as expected.
source.db55d547: The frequencies of groupmust be greater than or equal to 5. That is the case here. Thus, we can proceed with the test.
